attributes.action: Award the NHS, as an organisation, the George Cross for it's Covid-19 service.
attributes.additional_details: It is a fact that must be acknowledged by all UK citizens that the NHS has been at the forefront of our nations fight against Covid-19. As it's not possible (as much as I'd like it to be) to award all NHS personnel individual medals, would it not be fitting and appropriate to see the George Cross emblem embossed upon future NHS PPE as a lasting mark of the debt this country owes to these brave and dedicated people.
attributes.background: Award the medal, as Malta was awarded it at the end of WW2 for it's peoples endurance and resolve to survive the almost constant daily bombing of their homes and cities.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
